title: Shooting takes place in West Rand mall
content:
TNA Reporter

A shooting took place at Clearwater Mall on the West Rand Tuesday morning.

Two suspects have been killed by the undercover security as they foiled a robbery attempt. It is reported that the the thieves were targeting a parcel delivery vehicle at the banking section of the mall. "As far as we know the shooting only took place at the banking section of the mall, it is believed that one customer has only obtained minor injuries during the shooting", says ER24 spokesperson Russel Meiring. Several suspects have been wounded in the shooting. The mall has been cleared by the police.
